whiz.net.clients

Class HttpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ace
      • whiz.Whiz
        • whiz.WhizEntity
          • whiz.WhizObject
            • whiz.net.NetworkConnection
              • whiz.net.clients.HttpConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpConnectionInfo, HttpCookieHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpDeleter, HttpGetter, HttpPoster, HttpPutter

    public abstract class HttpConnection
extends NetworkConnection
implements HttpConnectionInfo, HttpCookieHandler
    Abstract HTTP connection class.
